scripts.build: npm run sync-version && npm run build:ext
scripts.sync-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json','utf8'));const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./manifest.json','utf8'));const cmp=(a,b)=>{const pa=a.split('.').map(Number),pb=b.split('.').map(Number);for(let i=0;i<3;i++){if(pa[i]>pb[i])return 1;if(pa[i]<pb[i])return -1;}return 0;};const v=cmp(pkg.version,m.version)>=0?pkg.version:m.version;pkg.version=v;m.version=v;fs.writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n');fs.writeFileSync('./manifest.json',JSON.stringify(m,null,2)+'\n');console.log('Synced version to '+v)"
scripts.package:zip: npm run build && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path release | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path release\\extensions\\* -DestinationPath release\\NewTab-$env:npm_package_version.zip -Force"
